definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :Ho 9:14 female breast;—abs. [[שָָׁד]] La 4:3; elsewhere du. [[שָׁדַיִם]] Ho 9:14 +, cstr. [[שְׁדֵי]] Ez Eze 23:21 +, sf. [[שָׁדַי]] Ct So 1:13, So 8:10, [[שָׁדַיִדּ]] So 4:5 +, etc.;—breast:

of woman Ho 2:4, Ez Eze 16:7, Eze 23:3, Eze 23:21 ([[שְׁדֵי]] [[נְעוּרָָיִךְ]], ‖[[דַּדַּיִךְ ]]), v:Eze 23:34 (> del. LXX Codd. Co;—all these of personif. People), Ct So 1:13, So 4:5, So 7:4, So 7:8, So 7:9, So 8:8, So 8:10; of mother Ps 22:10, c. [[יׇנַק]] suck Ct So 8:1, Job 3:12, Joe 2:15; Ho 9:14 (v. [[[חָמַק]]]); ´[[מִשּׁ]]: [[עֲתִיקֵי]] Is 28:9 i.e. those already weaned, mature (‖ [[גְּמוּלֵי מֵחָלָב]]).—Is 32:12 v. [[[ספד]]].
both human and animal, [[וׇרָָחַם]] ´[[בִּרְכוֹת שׁ]]: Ge 49:25 (poem in J).
